
                            
                            <p>买过的每天可以10点去秒杀，前几天知道的人少，我都抢到过2次了，今天没抢到 <br> 没买过的直接去领券随便买 <br> <a target="_blank" href="https://buy.shanrongmall.com/secondchannel/mBooks.jhtml?pageId=0000010283&amp;uniqueId=865777812&amp;channelNo=app-poster&amp;pageDefineId=PD031">https://buy.shanrongmall.com/secondchannel/mBooks.jhtml?pageId=0000010283&amp;uniqueId=865777812&amp;channelNo=app-poster&amp;pageDefineId=PD031</a> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/13/130336h7gzo22oov9caa9g.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/13/130336h7gzo22oov9caa9g.jpeg"> <br> </p>
